title: carrying and feeding are 2 separate things
body:
they aren't mutually exclusive. carrying is about how much gold you have in comparison to YOUR OWN TEAM, how much items/level you have, how much impact you have compared to the rest of your team. feeding is about how much gold you give to the enemy team

if your teammates are 4-0, 1-3, 2-0 and 5-0 and you're 20-50, you're technically the carry.

you are also the feeder if you are 20-50

It's not becuase the 20-50 person has more kills, but because he probably has more levels, more AD/AP, probably more defense too since that scales with levels, more damage dealt to enemies, more participation, etc and will impact a teamfight more
